desc: Load tested & certified here in NZ. Snap-D, it won’t over tighten, it won’t un-tighten. On or off, just one click away. No more hassles, made from 316 stainless steel. Ideal for the caravan, horse float, boat or motorbike toy hauler. You tow it & Snap-D secures it, fast.

layout.text: IF YOU TOW IT, SNAP-D SECURES IT. FAST!
